description: Provides a summary of a refresh schedule.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

parameters.name: ScheduleId
parameters.description: The ID of the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: RefreshSchedule
nested_items.description: The refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: ScheduleId
nested_items.description: An identifier for the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: ScheduleFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency for the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: Interval
nested_items.description: The interval between scheduled refreshes. Valid values are as follows:
MINUTE15: The dataset refreshes every 15 minutes. This value is only supported for incremental refreshes. This interval can only be used for one schedule per dataset.
MINUTE30:The dataset refreshes every 30 minutes. This value is only supported for incremental refreshes. This interval can only be used for one schedule per dataset.
HOURLY: The dataset refreshes every hour. This interval can only be used for one schedule per dataset.
DAILY: The dataset refreshes every day.
WEEKLY: The dataset refreshes every week.
MONTHLY: The dataset refreshes every month.

nested_items.name: RefreshOnDay
nested_items.description: The day of the week that you want to schedule the refresh on. This value is required for weekly and monthly refresh intervals.

nested_items.name: DayOfWeek
nested_items.description: The day of the week that you want to schedule a refresh on.

nested_items.name: DayOfMonth
nested_items.description: The day of the month that you want to schedule refresh on.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: The timezone that you want the refresh schedule to use. The timezone ID must match a corresponding ID found on java.util.time.getAvailableIDs().

nested_items.name: TimeOfTheDay
nested_items.description: The time of day that you want the datset to refresh. This value is expressed in HH:MM format. This field is not required for schedules that refresh hourly.

nested_items.name: StartAfterDateTime
nested_items.description: Time after which the refresh schedule can be started, expressed in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

nested_items.name: RefreshType
nested_items.description: The type of refresh that a datset undergoes. Valid values are as follows:
FULL_REFRESH: A complete refresh of a dataset.
INCREMENTAL_REFRESH: A partial refresh of some rows of a dataset, based on the time window specified.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the refresh schedule.
